name: NEHotspotNetwork
desc: Information about a Wi-Fi network associated with a command or a response.

items.name: var ssid: String
items.desc: The SSID for the Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var bssid: String
items.desc: The BSSID for the Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var signalStrength: Double
items.desc: The recent signal strength for the Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var isSecure: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the network is secure

items.name: var didAutoJoin: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the network was joined automatically or was joined explicitly by the user.

items.name: var didJustJoin: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the network was just joined.

items.name: var isChosenHelper: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the calling Hotspot Helper is the chosen helper for this network.

items.name: func setConfidence(NEHotspotHelperConfidence)
items.desc: Indicate the level of confidence in being able to handle the network.

items.name: enum NEHotspotHelperConfidence
items.desc: A type that indicates the hotspot helperâ€™s confidence in its ability to handle the network.

items.name: func setPassword(String)
items.desc: Provide the password for a protected network.
